definition: place/location/spot/point/office/department/bureau/respect/classifier for locations or items of damage: spot, point
to reside/to live/to dwell/to be in/to be situated at/to stay/to get along with/to be in a position of/to deal with/to discipline/to punish

sentences.english: Act towards people to deal with affairs mature and responsible, the ability is good to cooperate with others.
sentences.chinese: 待人處事成熟穩重，能很好的與他人合作。

sentences.english: Tell us about your post-purchase servicing.
sentences.chinese: 告訴我們有關你們售後處事的情形。

sentences.english: Among the functions of propriety, the most valuable is that it establishes harmony.
sentences.chinese: 禮的作用就是，待人處事以和諧爲最可貴。

sentences.english: It is far preferable take things as they come along with patience and equanimity.
sentences.chinese: 耐心鎮靜地接受世事變遷，是最好的處事之道。

sentences.english: Typical examples of doing things, one treats others.
sentences.chinese: 待人處事的典型事例之一。

sentences.english: Thirdly, we must be fair and reasonable.
sentences.chinese: 第三，待人處事都要公道。

sentences.english: The key to this week's chart is to keep everything light & moving freely…
sentences.chinese: 這一週處事的關鍵在於保持所有事務輕鬆自由地前進。

sentences.english: Maybe the bitter threaten our attitude towards peoples and doing things.
sentences.chinese: 沉痛可能威脅到以後我們待人處事的態度。

sentences.english: He already knows how to conduct himself .
sentences.chinese: 他已經懂得應該如何爲人處事了。

sentences.english: We often need to adjust our strategies to deal with people.
sentences.chinese: 我們經常需要適當調整爲人處事的方法。

sentences.english: Laugh at life, calm and doing things to make life into a very high level.
sentences.chinese: 笑對人生，坦然處事，使生命走向一個極高的境界。

sentences.english: Capstan imagesetter works such as shown in Figure 2.
sentences.chinese: 絞盤式照排機的處事道理如圖2所示。

sentences.english: While she has a high self-regard, she is always restrained.
sentences.chinese: 雖然她高傲，但她處事總是很有節制。

sentences.english: Success in organis depends on hard work…
sentences.chinese: 事業的樂成在於努力處事。

sentences.english: Always recommend the hotel's food and beverage outlets first.
sentences.chinese: 總是首先保舉本酒店的餐飲處事。

sentences.english: Before you become a doctor, become a man.
sentences.chinese: 成功待人處事是成爲好醫生的前置條件。

definition: to reckon/to calculate/to plan/to expect/to scheme
to haggle over every ounce/(fig.) to fuss over minor matters/to split hairs
